text:
- [Host] The NFL's My
Cause My Cleats campaign
is getting an AI upgrade powered by AWS.
Let's see how it works.

This season, three NFL Stars,
Josh Allen, Maxx Crosby
and DK Metcalf became the first players

to design their charitable
cleats using generative AI.
- Whoa, heck yeah.

- [Host] This custom design
technology opened up new

creative possibilities while
letting them take control
and personally design their own cleats?
- All right, I can make one right now.
- [Host] As part of the AWS partnership

with the NFL, AWS has
turned this tool into

a 3D web experience that
lets every football fan
design their own

custom cleats using the same
AI technology the pros used.
The process is simple
but powerful, thanks

to novel generative AI
framework developed specifically
for this application.
Start by describing your dream design.

Anything you could imagine want
an incredible galaxy scene,

geometric patterns, the
futuristic sports field,

just type it in, then
pick your visual style.

Want that edgy graffiti
vibe like Crosby's cleats

or maybe that colorful
modern look that Allen shows?

There are 10 unique art
styles to choose from,
but the results are unlimited.

Your input is transformed into
a customized prompt, powered
by Amazon Bedrock

and running on AWS EC2 instances
to rapidly generate artwork

through machine learning based
image generation processing.
This custom prompting backend

and model on AWS technology
converts the text-based prompt
into an AI generated image.
And using advanced 3D technology,

the design is placed on
a photorealistic cleat
viewable from every angle.
Not quite perfect.

Just keep tweaking it
until it's exactly right.
Add your favorite team's logo

and choose a charitable
cause that matters to you.

From the NFL superstars
to fans at home, AWS
and the NFL are putting the power
of AI driven design in everyone's hands.
Ready to create your own?
Head to cleatcreator.com
and start creating with generative AI.

Learn more about the NFL's
use of Gen AI for its

My Cause My Cleats initiative
at aws.com/mycausemycleats.
